name: SCTK UMAP dimensional reduction
description: This analysis executes UMAP (https://arxiv.org/abs/1802.03426) for reducing the dimension of your data. Typical for single-cell RNA-seq, we first perform a principal components analysis (PCA), which reduces the dimension of the data prior to running the UMAP algorithm.

SctkUmapDimensionReduce.raw_counts.description: The input raw count matrix. Must be an integer-based table. If you have output from a vendor, such as CellRanger, you must first pre-process to create a suitable count matrix.
SctkUmapDimensionReduce.raw_counts.name: Count matrix:

SctkUmapDimensionReduce.pca_dim.description: Prior to executing UMAP, we first reduce the space of the data using a principal components (PCA) projection. Unless you understand what you are doing, leave the default value. Using fewer PCA dimensions can result in data loss that may be undesirable.
SctkUmapDimensionReduce.pca_dim.name: Number of principal components for pre-processing:
